/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. Dominating the foreground is a large blue and white shipping container, brimming with sandbags, hinting at the industrial nature of the area. The container is parked on the side of the road, which is lined with trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban greenery to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
